title: Drawing, "Project for the door of an organ loft, with alternative suggestions", after 1751
medium: Pen, brush and black ink wash
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Variation of the designs of F.Cornille for Saint Roch in Paris of 1751, as engraved by A.Monchelet, plate 4.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for the door of an organ loft, with alternative suggestions", after 1751.
after 1751. Pen, brush and black ink wash. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-25.
